articles.title: MLB Wild Card: Phillies beaten down by Blue Jays in fifth straight loss - NBC Sports
articles.description: The Phillies opened their final homestand of the season in familiar fashion, losing for the 16th time in their last 20 games against teams over .500. By Corey Seidman
articles.content:

articles.description: The Beavers looking to add extra pop to the running game, and dealing with how to deploy tight end depth with standout Luke Musgrave sidelined indefinitely
